author: Sam Golden
title: Why it’s almost impossible to insure these 5 emerging technologies
description: We’re exposed to risk every day. From crossing the road to using our phones on the toilet. Every decision is a gamble and, subconsciously or consciously, we weigh up the likelihood of something going wrong. The insurance industry is built on this principle. P…
content:
Were exposed to risk every day. From crossing the road to using our phones on the toilet. Every decision is a gamble and, subconsciously or consciously, we weigh up the likelihood of something going wrong. 
The insurance industry is built on this principle. … [+7478 chars]
